short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: eEndprsement source contacts to your account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Contact Import Extension makes it really easy to send you surveys without ever having to login or send an email.  Simply highlight the email address from any screen in a Chrome browser, add a First and Last name to match the email and click send survey.   Your contact is imported to your eEndorsements user account and your client review request will be sent to that contact.
